name: jBash
tagline: JavaScript "Hacker Console"-Website, can be extended to your needs. Needs jQuery.
body:
### Welcome to jBash
jBash is a JavaScript "website" for simulating a linux style console in the browser.
There are some built in commands like "load" and "dir" and you can easily attach new commands.

Instead of running apps, you can load pages directly into the console. 
(These pages are located in the index-directory of your server.)

Look on my homeserver, there is the system up and running.
http://ben0bi.homenet.org

This page is just here to show you this image:
![jBash Screenshot](http://ben0bi.homenet.org/jBash.png)
Hope it will be loaded.

Have Fun! DON'T FORGET to have fun.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
